input.description:
String value - The name of a configuration item defined in a configuration module.
Example: Netcool_OMNIbus, HP_NNM, BMC_Event_Manager

An XML document providing the data template for single or multiple Concept elements.The event concept is an XML document containing specific elements used to assign multiple values to a single context item. Each value is associated with an element of the Concept.

output.description: XML output that contains results returned by the adapter request. The contents of the response will vary by adapter.

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <items> <item> <node> <xsl:value-of select="//node/text()" /> </node> <severity>${severity}</severity> <summary> <xsl:value-of select="//summary/text()" /> </summary> <owner-id> <xsl:value-of select="//owner-id/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </owner-id> <id> <xsl:value-of select="//id/text()" /> </id> <alert-group> <xsl:value-of select="//alert-group/text()" /> </alert-group> </item> </items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <items> <item> <community> <xsl:value-of select="//community/text()" /> </community> <enterprise-oid> <xsl:value-of select="//enterprise-oid/text()" /> </enterprise-oid> <varbind-params> <varbind-param> <varbind-param-name> <xsl:value-of select="//varbind-param-name/text()" /> </varbind-param-name> <varbind-param-value> <xsl:value-of select="//varbind-param-value/text()" /> </varbind-param-value> <varbind-param-type> <xsl:value-of select="//varbind-param-type/text()" /> </varbind-param-type> </varbind-param> </varbind-params> </item> </items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" encoding="XML" /> <xsl:template match="@*|node()"> <items> <item> <connection-parameters> <cell-name>${cell name}</cell-name> </connection-parameters> <xsl:if test="not(@name="")"> <arguments> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="Message"]/text() != '0'"> <argument> <name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Message</xsl:text> </name> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="Message"]/text()" /> </value> </argument> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="Status"]/text() != '0'"> <argument> <name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Status</xsl:text> </name> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="Status"]/text()" /> </value> </argument> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="Severity"]/text() != '0'"> <argument> <name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Severity</xsl:text> </name> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="Severity"]/text()" /> </value> </argument> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="Service"]/text() != '0'"> <argument> <name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Service</xsl:text> </name> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="Service"]/text()" /> </value> </argument> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="Owner"]/text() != '0'"> <argument> <name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Owner</xsl:text> </name> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="Owner"]/text()" /> </value> </argument> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="Occurences"]/text() != '0'"> <argument> <name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Occurences</xsl:text> </name> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="Occurences"]/text()" /> </value> </argument> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="Notes"]/text() != '0'"> <argument> <name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Notes</xsl:text> </name> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="Notes"]/text()" /> </value> </argument> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="Host"]/text() != '0'"> <argument> <name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Host</xsl:text> </name> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="Host"]/text()" /> </value> </argument> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="Host Address"]/text() != '0'"> <argument> <name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Host Address</xsl:text> </name> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="Host Address"]/text()" /> </value> </argument> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="Location"]/text() != '0'"> <argument> <name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Location</xsl:text> </name> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="Location"]/text()" /> </value> </argument> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="Priority"]/text() != '0'"> <argument> <name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Priority</xsl:text> </name> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="Priority"]/text()" /> </value> </argument> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="Occurred"]/text() != '0'"> <argument> <name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Occurred</xsl:text> </name> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="Occurred"]/text()" /> </value> </argument> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="Time to Close"]/text() != '0'"> <argument> <name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Time to Close</xsl:text> </name> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="Time to Close"]/text()" /> </value> </argument> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="Component Type"]/text() != '0'"> <argument> <name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Component Type</xsl:text> </name> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="Component Type"]/text()" /> </value> </argument> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="Host Class"]/text() != '0'"> <argument> <name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Host Class</xsl:text> </name> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="Host Class"]/text()" /> </value> </argument> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="Category"]/text() != '0'"> <argument> <name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Category</xsl:text> </name> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="Category"]/text()" /> </value> </argument> </xsl:if> </arguments> </xsl:if> </item> </items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

xpath-expression.xpath: concat("An event record was created successfully for the event description: '", .,"'")

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" cdata-section-elements="location" encoding="XML" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Events> <xsl:copy-of select="./node()/*" /> ${event} </Events> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

documentation.description: Create Event This workflow will create an event.
